listitem.para: Closes the screen without posting Count Tags, returning you to the application desktop.

Select to post the specified Count Tags. If an Item Site was frozen when its Count Tag was created, then both the Inventory count and the corresponding General Ledger (G/L) transactions will use the Count Tag created (i.e., frozen) date when the Count Tag is posted. On the other hand, if the Item Site was not frozen, the inventory and G/L transactions will use the Count Tag posted date.
